name: Keller Wilkerson
review: Everything was great, from ordering to wearing!! And my previous t-shirt washes and irons beautifully and is a pleasure to wear. The ordering system is easy, delivery is speedy and the parcel is beautifully and sustainably wrapped. Thank you!

name: Bryant Spence
review: Thank you very much for my new T's .I am delighted as always...however I am saddened to hear you are retiring soon.....I just hope the new people taking over will be as kind, patient and helpful as you have been. Frances

name: Vang Bowers
review: I bought three, fitted white T-shirts for my tall, slim, athletic teenage son and they look great on him. The fit is superb and I love that they are organic. We are delighted customers, so thank you.

name: Burgess Le
review: I love the product. Anyway, Iâ€™ve just placed an order for 6 t-shirts and I very much hope to see this business continue to grow.

name: Mckenzie Kim
review: Just wanted to let you know my T-shirt arrived in its usual immaculate package. Its the fourth T-shirt I have had from you and they are lovely and so easy to wear. I shall be ordering more.Thank you.

name: Joan Sandoval
review: Lovely quality t shirts, thankyou so much. Will be purchasing more I'm sure. Thicker cotton than similar priced organic cotton.
